title: LFM for Dynamic/Competitive team
body:
Hey folks,

Looking for a top, mid and jg for a dynamic queue squad, and possibly competitive team. 

We would prefer you be around Gold or higher.

HMU in game! Hope to talk to some of you soon!

IGN: Brindyyy

replies.body: I'm G3 jungle main and can top! if you want me hit me up on Lanks246.

Hey I'm silver 2 atm made it to gold 5 promos on the last day of last season but lost them. Main Jng but I have champs I can play in all roles. Been playing since season 2 so I have heaps of game knowledge. I'd be happy to play some normals with you all so you can see how I go :)
